1 #!/usr/bin/python3
2 import rospy
3 from std_msgs.msg import Int64
4 import paho.mqtt.client as mqtt
5 import sys
6 class color_bridge:
7  def __init__(self,bot_no) -> None:
8  self.pub = rospy.Publisher('dest', Int64, queue_size=10)
9  self.rate = rospy.Rate(10) # 10hz
10  self.client_ip = "192.168.0.172"
11  self.mqtt_client = mqtt.Client()
12  self.mqtt_client.connect(self.client_ip)
13  self.mqtt_client.subscribe("flipkart/color"+str(bot_no))
14  self.mqtt_client.on_message = self.callback
15  self.mqtt_client.loop_forever()
16  def callback(self, c, i, msg):
17  self.pub.publish(int(msg.payload))
18 
19 if __name__ == '__main__':
20  rospy.init_node('color_bridge', anonymous=True)
21  mqtt_bridge = color_bridge(sys.argv[1])
